about_the_game:
17 original background music tracks featured in PixelJunk™ Eden and PixelJunk™ Eden Encore by indie musician Baiyon.
Eden Tracks:
  • Become part of this
  • 637 volpe
  • Bord de lac
  • They said
  • Summer in winter
  • Flat frog
  • Swept the rain
  • Wheel window
  • Hand-wash
  • Druck der Farben
  • Return
  • 3 across 4

    Eden Encore Tracks:
  • Circle of clavier
  • 621 balena
  • Versprechen
  • Tribe of gravity
  • ~color()


    Sound File Info:

    mp3, 320Kbps, 44kHz, Stereo



    Songs will be placed in your PixelJunk™ Eden folder in the Steam Directory:

    ...Steam\steamapps\common\pixeljunkeden\Original-Soundtrack
